name: Space Inavders
description:
This is my take on the classic Space Invaders game. While trying to remain true to the original game. I did have to make a few changes. Mostly in the form of a Main Menu, and Game Over screen. 

This game was made primarily as a means of testing out my game engine. That was built onto of Monogame. So expect some quarks. If there are any issues please report them, contact info is down below. 

If you would like to see how the game was made. You can watch the devlog here.

Controls

  • A & D - Move
  • Space - Shoot

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GamePartum
Discord: https://discord.gg/Rdh5BJS
